job.title: Senior Software Engineer, iOS
job.description: stronguCompany DescriptionbrbrustrongEtsy is the global marketplace for unique and creative goods We build power and evolve the tools and technologies that connect entrepreneurs with buyers around the world As an Etsy employee youll tackle unique problems alongside talented coworkers committed to Keeping Commerce Human Weaposre large enough that youaposll focus on meaningful complex challenges but small enough that you can make a rewarding impactbrbrstronguJob DescriptionbrbrustrongEtsy is the global marketplace for unique and creative goods We build power and evolve the tools and technologies that connect entrepreneurs with buyers around the world As an Etsy employee youaposll tackle unique problems alongside talented coworkers committed to Keeping Commerce Human Weaposre large enough that youaposll focus on meaningful complex challenges but small enough that you can make a rewarding impactbrbrDo you love to craft amazing appsbrbrEtsy is looking for a passionate iOS Engineer to join our established Native Engineering organization In this role you will work to build beautiful experiences for Etsy buyers and sellers on Apple platforms You will collaborate with a talented team of engineers designers product and analytics colleagues who work together closely to support our iPhone and iPad apps Our growing team requires someone who will thrive making technical contributions in a lively environment but loves to have fun while they do sobrbrThis is a fulltime role located eventually in Brooklyn NY or San Francisco CA We are also open to remote hires in Canada and within all US states with the exception of Hawaii and AlaskabrbrstronguAbout The TeambrbrustrongYouaposll be joining a team that focuses on expanding the horizons of what is already possible on the Etsy iOS app We are a multidiscipline team of API engineers designers iOS engineers UX researchers and a product manager In the past we have worked on augmented reality video capture video display and other more cuttingedge technologiesbrbrstronguAbout Etsy EngineeringbrbrustrongThe technical staff at Etsy believes that code is craft and that the work we do is part of a larger creative culture represented by the hundreds of thousands of inspired artists and designers who make Etsy such a unique marketplace We believe that small empowered selfmotivated teams can do big things We believe in measuring everything taking advantage of our pioneering continuous deployment system to ship code early and often and a blameless culture based on trust and a commitment to learning Our product engineering teams have recently shipped projects like a unified and redesigned set of seller tools a better recommendation and personalization experience for buyers and a system to allow buyers and sellers to communicate more effectively about variations on their orders Learn more about our engineering philosophies tools and some of the challenges weaposve been solving on our Engineering blog httpscodeascraftcombrbrstronguQualificationsbrbrustrongstrongYou will do well in this role if youbrstrongulliLead with questions curiosity and kindness while being an excellent communicatorliliAre comfortable with saying I dont know doing research and returning with options complete with trade offsliliKnow your way around Xcode lldb the simulator instruments and various Apple devicesliliAre proficient in both Swift and ObjectiveCliliFeel comfortable working with API engineers in order to make the best API response possible for various platformsliliHave a deep knowledge of the various iOS frameworks along with knowledge of when to use which tool for what jobliliHave a willingness to understand accurately use and scale various iOS architecturesliliAppreciate working with folks who value knowledge sharing and want to contribute to a culture of generositybrliulstronguIn This Role You WillbrustrongulliAssist with technically leading the iOS engineering work when it comes to unexplored areas of the Etsy iOS appliliWork with Product Design UX API engineers and other iOS engineers in order to determine what is possible on the platform in order to surprise delight and engage our usersliliEffectively conduct technical discovery break down projects into actionable pieces and advise on timelines dependencies and tradeoffsliliWork with other iOS engineers on other teams to improve the Etsy app alongside iOS platform improvementsliliGuide more junior engineers in their technical and architectural decisions using thoughtful code reviews mentoring and project planning discussionsbrliulstronguAdditional InformationbrbrustrongstrongWhataposs NextbrbrstrongIf youaposre interested in joining the team at Etsy please send a cover letter and resume telling us why youaposd be right for the position As youaposve hopefully seen already Etsy is a place that values individuality and variety We donapost want you to be like everyone else  we want you to be like you So write to us and tell us what youaposre all aboutbrbrstrongOur PromisebrbrstrongAt Etsy we believe that a diverse equitable and inclusive workplace makes us a more relevant more competitive and more resilient company We encourage people from all backgrounds ages abilities and experiences to apply Etsy is an equal opportunity employer We do not discriminate on the basis of race color ancestry religion national origin sexual orientation age citizenship marital or family status disability gender gender identity or expression pregnancy or caregiver status veteran status or any other legally protected status We will ensure that individuals with disabilities are provided reasonable accommodations to participate in the job application and interview process to perform essential job functions and to receive other benefits and privileges of employment While Etsy supports visa sponsorship sponsorship opportunities may be limited to certain roles and skillsetsbrbrstronguFor US Roles OnlybrbrustrongMany Etsy roles are open to remote candidates and youaposll be able to identify which ones within the location header of each job description Weaposre open to remote hires from all US states except Hawaii and Alaska For candidates who will work remotely from Colorado visit this link for information related to Coloradoaposs Equal Pay for Equal Work Act
